name: IT MIGHT BE DELIVERED!
description:
Game made by Lucas BENARD, Kenahu CHAUVIN, Solenn REQUIER.

*********************************************
THE GAME

Mae has to deliver a package, but her ship has crashed. Find the lost parts and repair the ship to leave before dying by irradiation.

AZERTY | QWERTY

Z | W = Go forward
Q | A = Go left
D | D = Go left
S | S = Go backward

E | E  = Take up or put down a part
A | Q = Attach a part or restart the ship
